node.title: VoiceFlowPro Legal & Compliance Delivery Track
node.comment: Execution roadmap for legal readiness per Legal Document Drafting Action Plan, implementing-legal-documents brief, and French regulatory requirements.

node.title: Preparation & Research
node.comment: Assemble references, assign responsibilities, lock timeline (Day 1 drafting, Day 2 review).

node.title: Template Library Compilation
node.comment: Gather Stripe/YCombinator templates, CNIL GDPR checklists, Orson.io outputs; store in shared drive with versioning.

node.title: VoiceFlowPro Requirements Matrix
node.comment: Map product features (AI transcription, hybrid processing, team collaboration) to legal clauses (IP ownership, data processing, SLAs, warranties).

node.title: Drafting Sprint
node.comment: Produce initial drafts tailored to VoiceFlowPro.

node.title: Terms of Service
node.comment: Cover service description, acceptable use, subscription & billing, IP, liability, governing law (France), dispute resolution, termination.

node.title: Privacy Policy
node.comment: Detail data collection, AI processing, retention, user rights (access, deletion), international transfers, security measures, DPO contact.

node.title: License Agreement
node.comment: Define usage rights for software downloads, offline models, updates, restrictions, warranty disclaimers, limitation of liability.

node.title: Mentions Légales & CGV
node.comment: Produce legally required French pages: company identity, hosting, contact, VAT, CGV for SaaS sales.

node.title: Review & Validation
node.comment: Professional verification and compliance checks.

node.title: Internal QA
node.comment: Cross-team review (product, engineering, marketing) for feature alignment, messaging consistency, UX integration.

node.title: External Legal Review
node.comment: Submit to LegalStart/CGV-Expert; budget €200-€300; incorporate feedback, obtain compliance certificates if available.

node.title: Localization & Translation
node.comment: Provide French translations where required (Privacy, ToS, CGV) to meet local consumer laws.

node.title: Implementation
node.comment: Publish and integrate legal assets into product.

node.title: Website Integration
node.comment: Create legal center page, footer links, responsive layout, TL;DR sections, version history.

node.title: Product Integration
node.comment: Embed consent flows: signup checkbox, cookie banner, download EULA modal, in-app policy links.

node.title: Governance & Updates
node.comment: Set review cadence (quarterly), change log, notification plan, maintain legal contact info, maintain data processing records (CNIL).

node.title: Documentation & Evidence
node.comment: Keep compliance artifacts for audits.

node.title: Data Processing Register
node.comment: Document processing activities, storage locations, sub-processors (OpenAI, Supabase, Stripe).

node.title: Customer Support Playbooks
node.comment: Prepare scripts for legal questions, data requests, contract inquiries, SLA escalations.
